CHAT.comment: session is being recorded in the living room of May's parents. both her mother and father are present. it is a small room in a university apartment rented by her parents;

on one side of the room is a couch and on the other is a bookcase. in the corner of the room by the bookcase is the toybox. there is no door separating the living area from the kitchen area. CJ Research Assistant also present

u.a: mother and child are sitting on the floor
May laughs and then sits heavily
child crawls to mother and they both sit looking at a book
child makes a waving motion with her fingers
May smells the flowers in the book .
May feels the scratchy paper in the book
child opens a small book stuck to the page of the book
May looks at book and then at mother
May puts her finger through a hole in the page
mother and child both look towards the toybox in the corner
May crawls in the wrong direction towards CJ
May blows a kiss to CJ
note of mock embarrassment in mother's voice
mother leans up close to May's ear
points the child in the direction of the toybox
child stands and waves arms and makes excited noises
child looks at the recording equipment
mother sits May in front of her and looks straight into her eyes
May crawls to the toybox and begins to search for the book
<1w> May gets something other than the book , child has pulled a box of shapes that stick together out of the toybox
May examines the box she looks at her mother and then holds up the box
mother sticks two blocks together , the blocks are covered in spines which make them stick together
child looks towards father who is in the kitchen area
mother looks at the child . May looks at mother and holds out the separated blocks , she hands the blocks to mother
as she receives the blocks mother shows May how to fit the blocks together
mother hands two blocks stuck together to May
May turns to watch her father as he gets the book . mother attracts May's attention and shows her how to stick the blocks together for the second time . mother and May play with the blocks
May holds out the separated blocks
child looks at her father , he points to a picture in the book that he's holding . May looks at the picture and then at her father
father points to the picture of the sheep
May hands the blocks which she was holding to her mother
May looks to mother , mother opens the book to the picture of sheep
May is still looking at the pigs
mother looks at May and vice versa
mother gets a book and opens it to a picture of a banana
father opens the book and points to the picture of the banana
mother opens another book , May looks at the pictures
mother leans down in front of the child
child turns and plants a kiss on the chair
child holds hands out to Roy
May walks towards Roy and falls
silence , May walks to the bookcase and then uses it as a support to get to Roy
May walks over to Roy and hands him the blocks
May is standing by the stereo
May turns to her mother and shakes her head
May turns back to Roy and calls to him
May turns to the toybox and points at it
May goes to the toybox but is unable to pull the monkey out of it
child brings the monkey to mother
mother rolls a roller across a board , as the roller falls off the edge she says boom@o
mother repeats the game , as the roller falls May says "boom"
mother repeats the game a third time
May goes to the toybox and gets a doll
May is sitting by a speaker , she pats the front of it
May sits and begins to play with the two blocks . mother takes the blocks and tries once more to show May how they stick together
May checks eyes with mother several times and then looks at the blocks
mother hands the blocks back , May goes to Roy
mother goes into the kitchen area , May follows
May crawls to father . father and May look at a book
father points to a picture in the book
father points to a picture in the book
May turns to look at father
May turns and looks at father
silence during which May returns to her father and plays with the shape sorter
mother looks for a toy cow , finds it and hands it to May
mother hides the cow beneath a sweater
mother hugs May and rocks her
May is still looking at Loyal
May recalls the cow and looks for it
mother pushes the cow at May as a game
May looks for the cow again
the game stops and mother looks at May
Loyal peers around the camera at May
May stares at the camera and puts her hands to her head , playing peekaboo
May ignores her mother's call and continues to stare at Loyal
May goes to her mother , who gives her a kiss
May turns to look at her father
mother leans in front of May
May kisses mother and falls over
May watches mother pick up toys
May looks to Roy and calls
May puts the blocks into the shape sorter without the top on it
May has given up on the shape sorter and is trying to separate the "spiney blocks"
May turns to look at Loyal and fixes him with her gaze
May continues to look at Loyal and play with the shape sorter , alternatively looking up and down
meaning the lid of the toy
May cries because she has got a shape stuck in the top of the shapesorter
May returns to putting the shapes into the shape sorter and gives a contented cry
May puts a block on the monkey's head
the block falls off the monkey's head
May hands another block to the monkey
mother looks at the shape sorter parts
May tries to put the spiney blocks together , May cries for assistance
May plays with a different block
May goes to the camera and peers at Loyal
May laughs and then mother laughs
May looks at the monkey but continues to play with the shapesorter , she places a block on the monkey's head and her mother shakes it off
silence during which mother and May repeat the game , May picks up two spiney blocks and sticks them together
May looks first at mother and then at Loyal and then gives a very long and loud coo
silence during which mother gets the toy cow
she holds the cow out towards May
May has her fingers in her mouth
May stacks up the blocks into a tower
May is sitting on the floor by CJ , she gives CJ the blocks she's holding
May continues to play with CJ
May turns back to CJ and continues to play
mother starts to dig in the toybox , May watches her from across the room
mother finds the toy that she is looking for and makes the frog on the end jump by squeezing a bulb at the end of the tube that the frog is attached to
May turns and calls to Loyal again
May hands the jumping frog to mother
May picks up all the blocks in her hands
May gives the blocks to mother
places the shapesorter in front of May
May begins to drop shapes into the box
mother leans forward and speaks into the open plastic shapesorter which May is holding , her voice reverberates in the empty container
May coos into the cylinder again
